Module src
Package BoardDrawingGame.ServerClient.Server

Class ServerConnection

java.lang.Object
BoardDrawingGame.ServerClient.SocketConnection
BoardDrawingGame.ServerClient.Server.ServerConnection
public class ServerConnection extends SocketConnection
Represents a server-side connection handling for Dots And Boxes.
Author:
Ali Kaan Uysal, Bas Van Dijk
